text:
All the best and worst looks on the Oscars 2017 red carpet 0 By Laura Vitto and Lili Sams 2017-02-27 00:22:14 UTC 
Let's be honest â€” we're all just here to see what type of tiny bowtie Lion 's Sunny Pawar selected for tonight's red carpet (classic black, FYI). 
Elsewhere on the carpet, the film industry's A-list showed up in velvet, sequins and a surprising number of white tuxedos. Taraji P. Henson Tarell Alvin McCraney and David Oyelowo 
Image: Frazer Harrison/Getty
